data.text: @DaisyFried @acodrescu @NewYorker Please tell me that the @NewYorker hasn't fallen 4 the all-2-popular belief that Bannon's is a rare intellect.... misunderstood. Please tell me that. I'll wait here. And, in any case, don't put a lightweight on him like you did with your recent Franklin Graham softball game.

@DaisyFried @NewYorker @harrybelafonte @davidhogg111 @harukimurakami_ @JimCarrey @mgyllenhaal @emilyblunt @zadie_smith3 @johnkrasinski @SallyQYates @kehindewileyart @janetmock @boburnham @BootsRiley @KaceyMusgraves @jimmyfallon There is no festival without you...
